reviewText: Great old time nudies with some hardcore in vol III.
This was old movies in black and white, so it did not look as good as I was expecting it to look.

I enjoy watching girls from previous generations. Their beauty is always timeless and makes you wonder about a lot of things especially how the definition of beauty has evolved. This 3 disc collection offers many insights as to how beauty was percieved in the 1940's and 1950's. The girls on this collection are very natural and have a look of innocence and classic beauty. They smile because they embrace the beauty of their bodies. Their curves talk to you in a way they wouldnt talk to you today. The nudity is abundant here but it is done with style, meaning and above all good taste. The girls in these films you can tell did not used to trim their bush, which I find kind of appealing by todays standards. Their hair do's were very long and naturally curly.  I understand previous reviews take a harsh aim at the video quality of this collection. BUt you must understand these videos were shot over half a century ago. Back then they didn't have color nor HD film. It was done with 8MM cameras. BUt they have been restored and edited with fine calculation and cinematography. The 3rd video does offer hardcore triple XXX action, so be warned it is not totally a rated R" dvd.  Overall I was satisfied with this collection it is over 3 hours long and if you purchased it seperately it would probably cost you more. I bought mine for $10 so I thought it was a good bargain.
3 discs with the sorriest collection of vintage movies you could possibly find. Video and audio quality is poor, even by vintage movie standards. Don't waste your money on this.
